page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The work on this project was done entirely by the pupils of P4-P7 of Banff Primary School and the perceptions are those of the children involved. We are very grateful to the various landowners involved and also to the Planning department of Banff and Buchan District Council for their help and co-operation. The project could not have been completed without the help and support of the parents,many of whom tramped miles across fields and along river banks in pursuit of Domesday survey information.
